TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi RibbonMenuButton extends System.Windows.Controls.Menu

summary.span: 表示功能區上的按鈕，按下時會顯示下拉式功能表。

span.span: Represents a button on the ribbon that displays a drop-down menu when clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下圖顯示的範例控制項在大型、 中型和小型的變化，以及使用任何映像。The following illustration shows examples of controls in large, medium, and small variations, and with no images. ![功能區功能表按鈕控制項](~/add/media/wpfribbon-menubutton.png "功能區功能表按鈕控制項")![Ribbon menu button controls](~/add/media/wpfribbon-menubutton.png "Ribbon menu button controls") 功能區功能表按鈕控制項Ribbon menu button controls 下列圖例顯示控制開啟下拉式清單時。The following illustrations show controls when the drop-down is opened. ![功能區功能表按鈕控制項的拖放-下開啟](~/add/media/wpfribbon-menubutton-selection.png "開啟功能區功能表按鈕控制項下拉式清單")![Ribbon menu button control with drop-down open](~/add/media/wpfribbon-menubutton-selection.png "Ribbon menu button control with drop-down open") 開啟下拉式功能表的功能區功能表按鈕控制項Ribbon menu button control with drop-down open ![功能區功能表按鈕控制項的拖放-下開啟](~/add/media/wpfribbon-menubutton-selection2.png "開啟功能區功能表按鈕控制項下拉式清單")![Ribbon menu button control with drop-down open](~/add/media/wpfribbon-menubutton-selection2.png "Ribbon menu button control with drop-down open") 開啟下拉式功能表的功能區功能表按鈕控制項Ribbon menu button control with drop-down open ## Examples 下列範例顯示三個可用的項目以建立功能表按鈕的標記。The following example shows the markup to create a menu button with three available items. [!code-xaml[Ribbon_ControlsSample#RibbonMenuButton](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ribbon_controlssample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#ribbonmenubutton)]

value.span: 如果功能表的下拉部分顯示功能表按鈕上方則為 ，否則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 功能表下拉式清單會顯示功能表按鈕上方，如果靠近螢幕的邊緣，但沒有足夠空間可供它功能表按鈕下方。The menu-drop is displayed above the menu button if it is near the edge of the screen and there is not enough space for it below the menu button. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ KeyTip { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項的鍵盤快速鍵。

span.span: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut for the control.

value.span: 控制項的鍵盤快速鍵。

span.span: The keyboard shortcut for the control.

value.span: 已註冊的預設值是 。

span.span: The registered default is .

value.span: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

span.span: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks KeyTip 必須介於 1 到 3 個大寫字元，而且必須包含空格、 定位字元或新行字元。A KeyTip must be from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. 按鍵提示有時也稱為快速鍵或快速鍵，而且可用以啟動控制項的快速鍵組合。KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. 按鍵提示會出現在您按下 ALT 鍵。KeyTips appear on the when you press the ALT key. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks A包含指定的映像和控制項相關聯的標籤的大小和可見性資訊的屬性。A contains properties that specify size and visibility information for the image and label associated with a control. 此屬性指定的映像和標籤顯示的方式快速存取工具列中裝載此控制項時。This property specifies how the image and label will appear when this control is hosted in the Quick Access Toolbar. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

summary.span: 取得或設定顯示在這個控制項工具提示中的描述性文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the descriptive text that is displayed in the ToolTip for this control.

value.span: 要顯示在工具提示中的描述性文字。

span.span: The descriptive text to display in the ToolTip.

value.span: 已註冊的預設值是 。

span.span: The registered default is .

value.span: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

span.span: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!WARNING] > 每個功能區控制項繼承屬性。Each ribbon control inherits a property. 如果屬性設定後，將不會顯示功能區的增強型工具提示，會改為顯示標準的工具提示。If the property is set, the ribbon’s enhanced ToolTip will not be shown; the standard ToolTip will be shown instead. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例顯示用來建立增強型工具提示的標記。The following example shows the markup used to create the enhanced ToolTip. ![增強型工具提示](~/add/media/wpfribbon-tooltipenhanced.png "增強型工具提示")![Enhanced ToolTip](~/add/media/wpfribbon-tooltipenhanced.png "Enhanced ToolTip") 增強型工具提示Enhanced ToolTip [!code-xaml[Ribbon_ControlsSample#RibbonMenuButtonTT](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ribbon_controlssample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#ribbonmenubuttontt)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!WARNING] > 每個功能區控制項繼承屬性。Each ribbon control inherits a property. 如果屬性設定後，將不會顯示功能區的增強型工具提示，會改為顯示標準的工具提示。If the property is set, the ribbon’s enhanced ToolTip will not be shown; the standard ToolTip will be shown instead. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例顯示用來建立增強型工具提示的標記。The following example shows the markup used to create the enhanced ToolTip. ![增強型工具提示](~/add/media/wpfribbon-tooltipenhanced.png "增強型工具提示")![Enhanced ToolTip](~/add/media/wpfribbon-tooltipenhanced.png "Enhanced ToolTip") 增強型工具提示Enhanced ToolTip [!code-xaml[Ribbon_ControlsSample#RibbonMenuButtonTT](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ribbon_controlssample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#ribbonmenubuttontt)]

value.span: 已註冊的預設值是 。
